text: wkma zyan alshaytan lilmushrikin 'an yajealuu lilah taealaa min alharth wal'aneam nsybana, wlshrkayhm nsybana, zyant alshayatin likathir min almushrikin qatl 'awladihim khashyat alfqr; lywqeu hwla' alaba' fi alhlak biqatl alnafs alati haram allah qtlha 'iilaa balhq, wlykhltu ealayhim dinahum fyltbs, fydlu wyhlku, walaw sha' allah 'alaa yafealuu dhlk ma felwh, wlknh qddar dhlk laealimah bisu' halihim wmalhm, fatrkhm -ayha alrswl- wshanhm fima yaftarun min kdhb, fsyhkm allah baynak wbynhm
